TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EditorZoneBase extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone
Public MustInherit Class EditorZoneBase Inherits ToolZone

summary.span: 作為充當 控制項容器之所有區域控制項的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特製化的區域類別繼承自類別，並提供衍生區域，其中包含一組基底行為控制項。The class is a specialized zone class that inherits from the class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls. 有數種其他類型的類別; 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 概觀 」 主題類別。There are several other types of classes; for more information, see the overview topic for the class. 像其他工具區域，區域不會顯示當頁面處於標準瀏覽模式時，才看得見只有當頁面處於編輯顯示模式。Like other tool zones, zones are not visible when a page is in normal browse mode; they are visible only when a page is in edit display mode. 像其他工具區域區域只能包含的控制項，它們設計來包含特殊的型別 (在此情況下，控制項)。Also like the other tool zones, zones can only contain the special type of controls they were designed to contain (in this case, controls). 區域提供特殊的 UI，以編輯所包含的控制項。The zones provide a special UI for the editing controls they contain. 許多 UI 項目都是通用的 Web 組件控制項集合中的所有區域。Many of these UI elements are common to all zones in the Web Parts control set. Web 組件區域中常見的 UI 元素的詳細討論，請參閱適用於類別概觀主題類別。For a detailed discussion of the common UI elements in Web Parts zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 因為類別是抽象的您無法直接在網頁上使用它。Because the class is abstract, you cannot use it directly on a Web page. 相反地，您必須使用繼承自控制項類別並實作其行為。Instead, you must use a control that inherits from the class and implements its behavior. 您可以使用 「 衍生 」 區域中 Web 組件控制項集合中，提供控制項，或者您可以衍生自己的自訂控制項。You can either use the derived zone that is provided in the Web Parts control set, the control, or you can derive your own custom control. 類別會提供一般的使用者介面 (UI) 包含特殊的控制項，可讓使用者編輯內容、 配置、 外觀和的其他屬性控制項。The class provides a common user interface (UI) to contain special controls that enable end users to edit the properties, layout, appearance, and other attributes of controls. 某些屬性適用於 UI 是指動詞，例如， ，和屬性。Some properties that apply to the UI refer to verbs, such as the , , and properties. 動詞命令是由使用者在頁面上，執行一般動作，而且按鈕、 連結、 功能表項目或其他項目所表示的 UI 中。Verbs are common actions carried out by users on a page, and are represented in the UI by buttons, links, menu items, or other elements. 比方說，當使用者編輯控制項上的屬性時，他們可以按一下套用動詞命令，以儲存變更。For example, when users edit properties on a control they can click an apply verb to save the changes. 幾個其他屬性會影響在編輯 UI 各個點上顯示的文字。Several other properties affect text that is displayed at various points in the editing UI. 其中包括， ， ，和屬性。These include the , , , and properties. 兩個重要屬性提供相關的控制項的參考。Two important properties provide references to related controls. 屬性是集合區所包含的控制項。The property is a collection of the controls contained in the zone. 屬性是在所包含之控制項的物件參考-這可能是控制項或任何其他 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項、 使用者控制項或目前正在編輯的自訂控制項。The property is an object reference to a control contained in a --which might be a control or any other ASP.NET server control, user control, or custom control currently being edited. 最後，屬性參考的執行個體物件與區域相關聯，而且其中包含的週邊 UI 項目 （又稱為 chrome） 例如標題和框線樣式的樣式特性區域中的控制項。Finally, the property references an instance of an object that is associated with the zone, and that contains style characteristics of the peripheral UI elements (known as chrome) such as title and border styles for controls in the zone. 方法數類別專門用來處理其他控制項的編輯。A number of the methods of the class are specialized to handle the editing of other controls. 方法從編輯顯示模式變更頁面返回標準瀏覽模式。The method changes the page from the edit display mode back to a normal browsing view. 方法是建立 chrome （週邊 UI 項目框線、 動詞命令、 圖示和標題等） 括住每個區域中的控制項。The method is for creating the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each control in the zone. 方法是抽象方法，衍生的類別覆寫它建立的所有執行個體區所包含的控制項。The method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the controls contained in the zone. 可以由衍生類別呼叫方法，如果集合控制項中的某些程式設計的原因，加上旗標設定為重新建立，並更新集合的 Web 組件控制項的區域變更控制項。The method can be called by a derived class if the collection of controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, which flags the Web Parts control set to recreate and update the collection of controls. 方法用來設定的集合控制項新增至`null`編輯模式的顯示模式變更回瀏覽模式。The method is used to set the collection of controls to `null` when the display mode changes from edit mode back to browse mode. 最後，方法用來處理事件時控制項進入或離開編輯模式。Finally, the method is used for handling the event when a control is either entering or leaving edit mode. 比方說，這個方法是方便的地方，以同步處理的屬性值控制項中相關聯的可編輯值控制項。For example, this method is a convenient place to synchronize the property values of a control with the editable values in the associated controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範數個宣告式和以程式設計方式使用類別。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 類別是抽象的因為程式碼範例會使用衍生隨附於 Web 組件控制項集合的屬性和它所繼承的方法來示範的類別類別。Because the class is abstract, the code examples use the derived class that ships with the Web Parts control set, demonstrating the properties and methods that it inherits from the class. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 包含網頁控制項。A Web page that contains an control. - 自訂類別，示範一些類別成員。A custom class that demonstrates some of the class members. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 對於此程式碼範例正常運作，您需要取得使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說：變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在此程式碼範例中的.aspx 頁面與相同的資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含的宣告式參考的網頁控制項。The second part of the code example is a Web page that contains a declarative reference to an control. 頁面頂端附近`Register`使用者控制項指示詞。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive for the user control. 在頁面中以宣告的使用者控制項標記``項目。The user control tag is declared in the page with a `` element. 請注意，以下``項目``元素，其中包含控制項，並有各種不同的標籤和設定屬性，以判斷其外觀和行為。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains controls, and has a variety of tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 大部分的網頁中的程式碼示範各種以程式設計方式使用屬性和方法。Most of the code in the page demonstrates the various programmatic uses of the properties and methods. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是自訂類別，示範如何使用一些類別成員。The third part of the code example is a custom class that shows how to work with a number of the class members. 自訂的類別衍生自，讓它可以搭配在區域樣板中宣告式 Web 網頁的標記。The custom class derives from so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此程式碼範例會使用動態編譯;因此，您會注意到`Register`網頁頂端附近的指示詞不會參考組件檔案。This code example uses dynamic compilation; thus, you will notice that the `Register` directive near the top of the Web page does not reference an assembly file. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說：開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#12)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#12)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**從下拉式清單中，切換到編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** from the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下兩個控制項，其中的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 當編輯 UI 會顯示您所見的各種宣告式效果，以程式設計方式使用類別成員。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the effects of the various declarative and programmatic uses of the class members.

para.span: 如果您想要開發自訂的區域來裝載控制項，您必須判斷您是否要提供區域範本支援。

span.span: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.

para.span: 在區域樣板由實作的型別介面，以及如果您想要讓網頁開發人員使用您自訂的區域來參考，則需要您在網頁上的宣告式標記的區域內的控制項。

span.span: A zone template is created by types that implement the interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.

para.span: 如果您需要範本支援的區域，您應該繼承自類別。

span.span: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

para.span: 相反地，如果您自訂的區域並將其控制項將會各自獨立，它們不使用任何選項，以宣告方式在區域的範本中，指定控制項的網頁開發人員會以程式設計方式建立，然後您可以直接繼承從類別。

span.span: In contrast, if your custom zone and its controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果您這麼做時，很重要，您會實作方法，讓您自訂的區域將會運作。

span.span: If you do this, it is critical that you implement the method so that your custom zone will work.

related.span: 逐步解說：變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式，以繼承的類別，來叫用時傳遞物件至控制，可讓頁面以顯示 編輯使用者介面 (UI)。This constructor, when invoked by an inherited class, passes a object to the control, which enables the page to display the editing user interface (UI).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ApplyVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 取得 物件參考，其可讓使用者可將編輯變更套用至處於編輯模式的控制項。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to apply editing changes to a control in edit mode.

value.span: ，可讓使用者將變更套用至控制項。

span.span: A that enables end users to apply changes to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套用的動詞命令參考控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The apply verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 套用的動詞命令儲存目前正在編輯的伺服器控制項編輯畷樾簅已編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 中所做的變更。The apply verb saves editing changes that an end user has made in the editing user interface (UI) to a server control that is currently being edited. 根據預設，套用的動詞命令，會出現在 UI 中以控制項。By default, the apply verb appears in the UI as a control. 按鈕的類型可以是影像、 連結或實際的按鈕，您可以設定這所有動詞命令按鈕 （不適用於個別的按鈕） 區域中設定的繼承在區域層級的屬性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 套用的動詞命令是區域層級的控制項，這表示雖然可能有數個控制項，編輯伺服器控制項處於編輯模式的一或多個屬性的每個套用動詞命令適用於通用從所有套用所有變更為伺服器控制項之區域中的控制項。The apply verb is a zone-level control, which means that although there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the apply verb works universally to apply all changes from all the controls in the zone to the server control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁上的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此範例可自訂動詞命令的文字。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取屬性以程式設計方式使用切換按鈕啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#4)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當控制項和編輯 UI 會顯示，您可以看到 [] 按鈕，表示套用動詞命令，然後按一下**啟用切換 ApplyVerb**按鈕，以啟用或停用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the apply verb, and click the **Toggle ApplyVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CancelVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 取得 物件參考，其可讓使用者取消對處於編輯模式之控制項的編輯變更。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to cancel editing changes to a control in edit mode.

value.span: ，可讓使用者取消對控制項的編輯變更。

span.span: A that enables end users to cancel editing changes to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消動詞命令參考控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The cancel verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 取消動詞命令取消編輯終端使用者對伺服器控制項在編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 中的變更。The cancel verb cancels editing changes that an end user has made to a server control in the editing user interface (UI). 根據預設，取消動詞命令，會出現在 UI 中以控制項。By default, the cancel verb appears in the UI as a control. 按鈕的類型可以是影像、 連結或實際的按鈕，您可以設定這所有動詞命令按鈕 （不適用於個別的按鈕） 區域中設定的繼承在區域層級的屬性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 當使用者取消編輯變更，無變更的會套用至伺服器控制項正在編輯的控制項。When a user cancels editing changes, none of the changes in the controls are applied to the server control that is being edited. 此外，頁面會保留在編輯顯示模式，但隱藏的控制項和正在編輯的控制項不再被選取。In addition, the page remains in edit display mode, but the controls are hidden and the control that was being edited is no longer selected. 這可讓使用者選取另一個顯示編輯，而不需要變更的控制項的模式。This allows an end user to select another control to edit without having to change display modes again. 取消動詞命令是區域層級控制項，也就是說，雖然可能有數個控制項，每個正在編輯處於編輯模式的伺服器控制項的一或多個屬性取消動詞命令適用於通用取消所有變更，從所有區域中的控制項。The cancel verb is a zone-level control, meaning that while there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the cancel verb works universally to cancel all changes from all the controls in the zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁上的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此範例可自訂動詞命令的文字。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取屬性以程式設計方式使用切換按鈕啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#5)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當控制項和編輯 UI 會顯示，您可以看到 [] 按鈕，表示取消動詞命令，然後按一下**CancelVerb 啟用切換**按鈕，以啟用或停用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the cancel verb, and click the **Toggle CancelVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 使用者按一下區域標題中的關閉動詞命令時呼叫，這個方法會結束編輯 控制項的處理，並將 Web 組件頁面的顯示模式返回瀏覽模式。

span.span: Called when a user clicks a close verb in the header of a zone, this method ends the process of editing controls, and returns a Web Parts page's display mode to browse mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供實作中的基底方法宣告的類別。The method provides an implementation for the base method declared in the class. 實作僅呼叫方法，執行會結束編輯的處理程序所需的步驟。The implementation simply calls the method, which carries out the steps necessary to end the editing process. 呼叫方法傳回的頁面，即可瀏覽模式中，並取消任何所做的編輯變更控制項。Calling the method returns the page to browse mode, and cancels any editing changes made to any controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateChildControls() cil managed

summary.span: 建立與 區域相關聯的一組子控制項。

span.span: Creates the set of child controls associated with an zone.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome CreateEditorPartChrome() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function CreateEditorPartChrome () As EditorPartChrome
abstract member CreateEditorPartChrome : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome override this.CreateEditorPartChrome : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome

summary.span: 取得新 物件的參考，該物件用於呈現 區域的週邊使用者介面 (UI) 項目。

span.span: Gets a reference to a new object used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements around an zone.

returns.span: ，呈現區域的週邊 UI 項目。

span.span: An that renders the peripheral UI elements for the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回新物件。The method returns a new object. Chrome 包括下列週邊 UI 項目所括住每個個別區域中的控制項： 框線; 標題列顯示的標題列，包括選擇性圖示、 標題文字和動詞命令功能表; 以及不會出現在項目內的項目控制項的頁尾區域。Chrome includes the following peripheral UI elements that surround each individual control in the zone: a border; a title bar; the items that appear within the title bar, including optional icons, title text, and a verbs menu; and items appearing in the footer area of a control. 方法會使用傳回物件來建立有關每個 chrome控制項。The method uses the returned object to create the chrome around each control.

para.span: 可以提供不同的實作在衍生類別中覆寫方法。

span.span: The method can be overridden in a derived class to provide a different implementation.

para.span: 例如，您可以建立自訂類別，以讓您更充分掌控轉譯和編輯 UI 的外觀。

span.span: For example, you might create a customized class to give you more control over the rendering and appearance of the editing UI.

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法在衍生的區域中，您可以建立您的自訂覆寫方法中的物件。

span.span: If you override the method in a derived zone, you could create your custom object in the overridden method.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function CreateEditorParts () As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 提供衍生區域可覆寫的基底方法宣告，以處理建立區域所包含之 控制項的細節。

span.span: Provides a base method declaration that derived zones can override to handle the details of creating the controls contained in a zone.

returns.span: ，包含與區域相關聯之 控制項的集合。

span.span: An that contains the collection of controls associated with the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法未提供任何實作。The method provides no implementation. 它用來在衍生類別中實作，應該用來建立集合的執行個體控制項包含在區域中，只要裝載的 Web 網頁進入編輯模式。It is intended to be implemented in a derived class, and should be used to create an instance of the collection of controls contained in a zone, whenever the hosting Web page enters edit mode. 方法提供實作的其中一個範例方法。The method provides one example of an implementation of the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，其中該值指出目前是否顯示 控制項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control is currently displayed.

value.span: 如果目前顯示 ，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the is currently displayed; otherwise, .
The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditorPartChrome As EditorPartChrome

summary.span: 取得與 區域相關聯之 類別執行個體的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the instance of the class associated with the zone.

value.span: ，包含區域中 控制項之 Chrome 項目的樣式特性。

span.span: An that contains style characteristics for the chrome elements of controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供參考與區域相關聯的物件。The property provides a reference to the object associated with a zone. 當呼叫方法，它會建立的執行個體類別，而這個執行個體用來呈現的週邊使用者介面 (UI) 項目 （也稱為 「 chrome 」），所有區域中的控制項。When the method is called, it creates an instance of the class, and this instance is used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements (also called the chrome) for all controls in the zone. 個別之 chrome 項目的控制項框線和其他項目包含在其標頭區域，例如動詞命令、 圖示和標題文字，以及其頁尾區和其包含的項目。The chrome elements for an individual control include its border and other items in its header area, such as verbs, icons, and title text, as well as its footer area and its included elements.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditorParts As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 取得 區域中包含之所有 控制項的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all the controls contained in an zone.

value.span: ，包含區域中的所有個別 控制項。

span.span: An that contains all the individual controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會提供所有集合的參考區域中的控制項。The property provides a reference to a collection of all the controls in the zone. 它同時參考提供與 Web 組件控制項集合中，任何自訂控制項新增至區域的控制項。It references both the controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom controls that are added to the zone. 因為集合是唯讀的開發人員想要建立自訂控制項的一般編輯之用，並將其新增至集合應該覆寫方法。Because the collection is read-only, developers who want to create custom controls for general editing purposes and add them to the collection should override the method. 如果您設計自訂若要編輯特定的控制項控制項，您應該覆寫的成員介面-方法並屬性-中控制項。If you design custom controls to edit a specific control, you should override the members of the interface--the method and the property--in the control. 若要覆寫這些成員的原因是為了啟用您控制項來建立自訂控制，並將其新增至集合時正在編輯您的控制項，並為編輯控制項提供的物件參考若要它們正在編輯的控制項。The reason to override these members is to enable your control to create the custom controls and add them to the collection when your control is being edited, and to provide the editing controls with an object reference to the control they are editing. 如果您想要新增自訂控制項，以編輯的伺服器控制項，不是繼承自類別，您必須實作介面的類別中，就像您一樣的控制項。If you want to add a custom control to edit a server control that does not inherit from the class, you must implement the interface in the class just as you would for a control. > [!NOTE] > 請注意任何加入至集合控制項的實作中方法必須有指派給其 ID 屬性的值，否則將會擲回例外狀況集合指派給屬性。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範屬性包含所有參考網頁中以宣告方式所參考的控制項。The first part of the code example demonstrates that the property contains references to all the controls that are referenced declaratively in the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 以程式設計方式存取的程式碼範例的第二部分屬性和每個控制項中會列出識別碼控制項。The second part of the code example programmatically accesses the property and lists the ID of each control in a control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#6)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以按一下**顯示 EditorParts 集合**按鈕，以列出所有識別碼中所參考的控制項屬性。When you load the page in a browser, you can click the **Display EditorParts Collection** button to list the IDs of all the controls referenced in the property.

exception.span: 加入集合中的 未對其 ID 屬性指派任何值。

span.span: An being added to the collection does not have a value assigned to its ID property.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override string EmptyZoneText { get; set; }

member this.EmptyZoneText : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定區域不包含控制項時出現的訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a message that appears when a zone contains no controls.

value.span: 字串，包含空白區域中出現的訊息。

span.span: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.

value.span: 預設的特定文化特性字串是由 .NET Framework 所提供。

span.span: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ErrorText { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ErrorText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ErrorText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ErrorText : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在編輯使用者介面 (UI) 頂端顯示的區域層級錯誤訊息文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of a zone-level error message to display at the top of the editing user interface (UI).

value.span: 包含錯誤訊息的當地語系化字串。

span.span: A localized string that contains the error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含文字的錯誤訊息，可以顯示在 UI 中，如果發生錯誤時呈現控制項衍生自類別。The property contains the text of an error message that can be displayed in the UI if an error occurs while rendering controls derived from the class. 任何個別中發生錯誤時，將會顯示在區域頂端的錯誤訊息區所包含的控制項。The error message is displayed at the top of the zone if an error occurs in any of the individual controls contained in the zone. 此外，個別控制項可以顯示自己附近的控制項，會收到錯誤的錯誤訊息。In addition, individual controls can display their own error messages near the control that receives an error. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

value.span: 此字串包含區域的頁首文字。

span.span: A string that contains the header text for the zone.
The default is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中的文字，可提供終端使用者指示。

span.span: Gets or sets the text in a control that provides directions for end users.

value.span: 字串，包含使用者的指示。

span.span: A string that contains the directions for end users.

value.span: 適用於特定工具區域的預設值由衍生的 類別提供。

span.span: A default value appropriate to specific tool zones is provided by derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void InvalidateEditorParts() cil managed

summary.span: 將與 區域相關聯的 控制項集合設為 ，會導致呼叫 方法重新建立集合。

span.span: Sets the collection of controls associated with an zone to , which results in the method being called to recreate the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以由衍生類別呼叫方法，如果清單相關聯的控制項區域已變更基於某些原因，而且衍生的類別需要取得更新的清單控制項。The method can be called by derived classes if the list of controls associated with an zone has changed for some reason, and the derived class needs to get an updated list of controls. 在衍生的類別應該呼叫，這會將目前的集合設定為`null`。The derived class should call , which sets the current collection to `null`. 下次集合被存取時，自動設定 Web 組件控制項叫用以方法用來建立已更新的集合。The next time that the collection is accessed, the Web Parts control set automatically invokes the method to create the updated collection.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object)

span.span: The previously saved state.

summary.span: 載入先前儲存的區域狀態資訊。

span.span: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法會覆寫基底的方法，來檢查網頁是否正在載入因為區域中按一下 [確定] 的動詞命令、 取消動詞命令或套用動詞命令。The method overrides the base method to check whether the page is being loaded because an OK verb, a cancel verb, or an apply verb was clicked in the zone. 如果是的話，則方法會處理每個個別的案例相關聯的狀態。If so, the method handles the state associated with each respective scenario.

exception.span: 物件的大小不等於目前檢視狀態物件的大小。

span.span: The size of the object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property OKVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 取得 物件參考，該物件將編輯變更套用至處於編輯模式的控制項，並隱藏編輯使用者介面 (UI)。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that applies editing changes to a control in edit mode, and hides the editing user interface (UI).

value.span: ，將編輯變更套用至控制項，並隱藏編輯 UI。

span.span: A that applies editing changes to a control and hides the editing UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的 [確定] 的指令動詞控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The OK verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 就像是套用動詞命令，因為當使用者按一下它時，它會套用使用者對伺服器控制項的編輯變更。It is similar to the apply verb, in that when a user clicks it, it applies editing changes that the user has made to a server control. 此外，編輯控制項隱藏的正在編輯的控制項不會再選取 （可讓使用者編輯另一個控制項），且頁面會保留在編輯模式。In addition, the editing controls are hidden, the control that was being edited is no longer selected (which allows the user to edit another control), and the page remains in edit mode. 根據預設，[確定] 的動詞命令會顯示在 UI 中以控制項。By default, the OK verb appears in the UI as a control. 按鈕的類型可以是影像、 連結或實際的按鈕，您可以設定這所有動詞命令按鈕 （不適用於個別的按鈕） 區域中設定的繼承在區域層級的屬性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 確定所用的動詞命令是區域層級控制項，也就是說，雖然可能有數個控制項，每個正在編輯處於編輯模式的伺服器控制項的一或多個屬性確定所用的動詞命令的運作方式通用套用所有變更，從所有在區域中，並隱藏區域本身除外的所有控制項的控制項。The OK verb is a zone-level control, meaning that while there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the OK verb works universally to apply all changes from all the controls in the zone, and to hide all the controls except for the zone itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁上的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此範例可自訂動詞命令的文字。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取以程式設計方式使用切換按鈕啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#7)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當控制項和編輯 UI 會顯示，您可以看到 [] 按鈕，表示正常的動詞命令，然後按一下**啟用切換 OKVerb**按鈕，以啟用或停用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the OK verb, and click the **Toggle OKVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: An that raises the event.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 準備 Web 網頁以進入或結束編輯顯示模式時，引發 事件，並終結區域中所有 和子控制項。

span.span: Raises the event and destroys all and child controls in the zone in preparation for a Web page to enter or exit the edit display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供在基底方法的實作類別。The method provides an implementation for the base method in the class. 主要目的方法是準備 Web 網頁以進入或結束編輯顯示模式。The main purpose of the method is to prepare a Web page to enter or exit the edit display mode. 方法會終結區域中所包含的所有控制項，然後再呼叫基底方法，這會引發中的事件控制項。The method destroys all controls contained in the zone and then calls the base method, which raises the event in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫衍生類別中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自訂編輯器區域衍生自類別，使它可以搭配在區域樣板中宣告式 Web 網頁的標記。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自訂類別覆寫方法，將該區域的背景色彩設定為指定的色彩，然後呼叫基底方法，該命令可破壞所有的子系和控制項以準備進入或離開編輯顯示模式。The custom class overrides the method, setting the background color of the zone to a specified color, and then calls the base method, which destroys all child and controls in preparation for entering or exiting edit display mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#13)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#13)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當控制項和編輯使用者介面 (UI) 會顯示，您可以看到此區域具有程式碼中指定的背景色彩。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see that the zone has the background color specified in the code.

summary.span: 準備 控制項以進入或退出編輯模式時，會在區域中引發 事件，並將 集合設為 。

span.span: Raises the event and sets the collection to in the zone in preparation for a control to enter or exit edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您提供個人時，就會發生此事件的自訂處理控制項進入或離開編輯模式。The method enables you to provide custom handling for the event that occurs when an individual control enters or exits edit mode. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫衍生類別中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自訂編輯器區域衍生自類別，使它可以搭配在區域樣板中宣告式 Web 網頁的標記。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自訂類別覆寫方法，設定特定的控制項的背景色彩所編輯，並接著會呼叫基底方法。The custom class overrides the method, setting the background color of the specific control that is being edited, and then calls the base method. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#14)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#14)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當和編輯使用者介面 (UI) 可見，您可以看到選取的控制項有程式碼中指定的背景色彩。When the and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see that the selected control has the background color specified in the code.

span.span: A that contains the argument for the event.

summary.span: 執行與其中一個區域動詞命令相關聯的動作，或引發回傳至伺服器的事件。

span.span: Carries out the actions associated with one of the zone verbs, or raises an event that posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法如果其中一個這些動詞命令的使用者介面 (UI) 中按下 [確定] 的動詞命令、 取消動詞命令或套用動詞命令相關聯的個別動作執行。The method carries out the respective actions associated with the OK verb, the cancel verb, or the apply verb, if one of these verbs was clicked in the user interface (UI). 否則，便會產生回傳至伺服器的事件。Otherwise, it raises an event that posts back to the server.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

span.span: The that receives the zone's content.

summary.span: 將區域呈現至指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the zone to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底方法，從類別來呼叫方法，它會驗證 HTML 表單區域控制項呈現在執行階段。The method overrides the base method from the class to call the method, which verifies that an HTML form is rendered for the zone control at run time. 驗證之後，該方法接著會呼叫基底的方法，以呈現區域的完整內容。After the verification, the method then calls the base method to render the full contents of the zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderBody(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderBody (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the zone's body content.

summary.span: 覆寫基底方法以呈現繼承自 類別之區域的主體區域。

span.span: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法會呈現的主體區域區域，這是在頁首和頁尾區域之間的主要內容區域，並包含控制項。The method renders the body area of an zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法會覆寫中的基底方法類別，以提供位址配置和樣式的特製化的呈現屬性 (attribute) 只會套用到區域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to zones. 此方法會呈現資料表，其中包含本文中，整個內容，並在該資料表中，設定不同的屬性值，根據各種條件，包括目前的顯示模式的頁面。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including the current display mode of the page. 如果不有任何包含的控制項，它就會呈現的值屬性。If there are no contained controls, it renders the value of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫衍生類別中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自訂編輯器區域衍生自類別，使它可以搭配在區域樣板中宣告式 Web 網頁的標記。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自訂類別覆寫方法，將 HTML 加入`
`建立標頭和主體的區域之間的線條的項目。The custom class overrides the method, adding an HTML `
` element to create a line between the header and body of the zone. 然後，它會呼叫基底方法，來呈現區域的本文內容的其餘部分。It then calls the base method to render the rest of the zone's body contents. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#15)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#15)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當會顯示控制項和編輯使用者介面 (UI)，您可以看到所建立的標頭和本文編輯器區域之間的行。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see the line created between the header and body of the editor zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderVerbs(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderVerbs (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the zone's body content.

summary.span: 呈現在區域層級上套用的動詞命令。

span.span: Renders the verbs that apply at the zone level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈現的動詞命令的動作套用至整個區域： 確定所用的動詞命令、 取消動詞命令，並套用動詞命令。The method renders the verbs whose actions apply to the entire zone: the OK verb, the cancel verb, and the apply verb. 在中參考這些動詞， ，和屬性。These verbs are referenced in the , , and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫衍生類別中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自訂編輯器區域衍生自類別，使它可以搭配在區域樣板中宣告式 Web 網頁的標記。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自訂類別覆寫方法，將一些文字加入至現有的值區域層次動詞命令的每個屬性。The custom class overrides the method, adding some text to the existing value of the property for each of the zone-level verbs. 然後，它會呼叫基底方法，來呈現所有動詞命令。It then calls the base method to render all the verbs. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#16)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#16)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當會顯示控制項和編輯使用者介面 (UI)，您可以看到文字已變更區域層次動詞命令，在區域底部的按鈕上。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see the text has been changed on the buttons for the zone-level verbs at the bottom of the zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來所發生的任何檢視狀態變更。

span.span: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred after a page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 傳回區域控制項的目前檢視狀態。

span.span: Returns the zone control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與區域相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the zone, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫基底方法，以儲存檢視狀態，再也不必再套用、 [取消] 和 [確定] 的動詞命令相關聯的任何檢視狀態。The method calls the base method to save view state, and then also saves any view state associated with the apply, cancel, and OK verbs.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 追蹤變更區域控制項的檢視狀態。

span.span: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會先呼叫基底方法，來追蹤相關聯的檢視狀態區域，然後便可開始追蹤套用、 [取消] 和 [確定] 的動詞命令的檢視狀態。The method first calls the base method to track view state associated with an zone, and then begins tracking view state for the apply, cancel, and OK verbs.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartToEdit As WebPart

summary.span: 取得對目前正在編輯之 控制項的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control that is currently being edited.
A that is currently in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一個可以編輯控制項，一次，以及當控制項處於編輯模式，屬性提供該控制項的參考。Only one control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the property provides a reference to that control. 參考的控制項是所參考的控制項相同屬性。The control referenced is the same as the control that is referenced by the property. 因此，目前正在編輯控制項一律目前未選取。Therefore, a control that is currently being edited is always currently selected.

para.span: 受保護屬性是只能在衍生的類別，可以呼叫基底的這個屬性中存取類別，以取得目前正在編輯的控制項的物件參考。

span.span: The protected property is accessible only in derived classes, which can call this property on the base class to get an object reference to the current control being edited.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
